amendment.description: Amendment sought to earmark $25 million from FEMA funding for Project Impact dealing with pre-disaster hazard mitigation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to earmark $25 million of the amount appropriated by the bill FEMA emergency planning and assistance for pre-disaster hazard mitigation activities.

action.text: Amendment (A026) offered by Mrs. Lois Capps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 231 (Roll no. 294).
